scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.pyramids

Class ImagePyramid

  • java.lang.Object
    • scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.pyramids.ImagePyramid

  • public final class ImagePyramid
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent an image pyramid created by downsampling an image a series of times.
    Author:
    Scott Lockett

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> imagePyramidList
      The pyramid of the images at each level

      The original image which the pyramid is formed from
      private int PYRAMID_LEVELS
      The number of the time the image is going to be sampled.
      private java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.Size> sizePyramid
      The size of each of the sampled images at each layer of the pyramid
